text: Chargers wide receiver Vincent Jackson was arrested early yesterday on suspicion of drunken driving. Jackson failed sobriety tests shortly after 2 a.m. on state Route 52 in San Diego, said California Highway Patrol Officer Ray Scheidnes. He said he did n't know Jackson's blood alcohol level. Jackson was on probation for a previous DUI arrest, Highway Patrol Officer Brad Baehr said. He was taken to the San Diego County jail and released.
title: Chargers' Jackson arrested on suspicion of DUI.
